title: LeakCanary crashes instant apps due to creating notifications/not handling SecurityException
body:
When an app is ran as instant app, it is apparently not allowed to create notifications.

When LeakCanary is installed, it obviously creates many notifications and the app will crash when this happens.

Another instant app related bug: #1196 

